body: Hey everyone! Is there any good, cheap video editing software out there? It would be great if they were free but my budget is $25 - $35. Thanks so much for the help!
body_tagged: Hey everyone! Is there any good, cheap video editing software out there? It would be great if they were free but my budget is $25 - $35. Thanks so much for the help!
title: Good video editing programs?

replies.body: I don't really want to Illegally download something. I'm think of saving up my money for Camastia or Sony Vegas. But for now I have to stick with Windows Movie Maker :/ (Im looking for a program because I recently got over my free trial of Camastia Pro.)

replies.body: All the Adobe platforms are great! However, they come at an expensive cost. You can purchase a creative cloud account, for instance, pay a certain amount of money for one years worth of usage. Photoshop, is great for editing your images, and premier pro, is the Adobe version of Imovie. Honestly I have zero experience in the premier pro cc, but I've heard its good.
replies.body_tagged: All the Adobe platforms are great! However, they come at an expensive cost. Photoshop, is great for editing your images, and premier pro, is the Adobe version of Imovie. Honestly I have zero experience in the premier pro cc, but I've heard its good.
